column4: got a couple questions... I have a Wireless Network between my windows pc, my winlaptop and ubuntu. this is working fine however I cannot get the internet (dialup) to work at the same time as the wireless network. I have to disable the WLAN to go anywhere on the interent, any sugestions? and what is the best dvd player for ubuntu?
well as far as dvd player, i'd recommend xine
ok i got ogle.... not very pretty but if it does the job...
